title: GRAPENT Wide Leg Jeans for Women High Waisted Flare Trendy Stretchy Denim Pants Duo Pockets Trouser Jeans
description: Jeans Inseam - 31''. These womens wide leg jeans boast two front patched pockets that add a touch of uniqueness to their design; the patchwork detail enhances the aesthetic appeal while providing functional storage.

These high waisted stretch jeans for women are designed to sit comfortably at the natural waist and relax through thigh; the high-rise waistline offers a flattering and elongating effect while providing excellent coverage.

These womens jeans are made from a premium, skin-friendly denim fabric that offers exceptional breathability and boasts stretchability, ensuring unparalleled comfort that lasts from morning till night.
Occassions: These women’s jeans are suitable for work, daily, street, casual wear, western wear, country concert, nashville, night out, going out, vacation, etc.

GRAPENT wide leg pants for women run true to standard US sizes. size Small fits size 4 to size 6, size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, size Large fits size 12 to size 14, size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22.
